channel.title: CVE Feed for Cardo Systems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cardo Systems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2014-125001|2024-08-06T14:10:56.233Z -- cardo%20systems -- scala%20rider%20q3
item.description: A vulnerability classified as critical has been found in Cardo Systems Scala Rider Q3. Affected is the file /cardo/api of the Cardo-Updater. Unauthenticated remote code execution with root permissions is possible. Firewalling or disabling the service is recommended.
